import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../assets/css/Login.css"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import baseUrl from "../../baseUrl"; const CreateProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [currentTag, setCurrentTag] = useState('flower') const [error, setError] = useState({ show: false, title: "" }) const [data, setData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", tag: "", }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target.title.value, e.target.description.value) if(e.target.title.value === undefined || e.target.title.value.length === 0){ setError({...error, show: true, title: "Title cannot be empty"}) }else{ setError({...error, title: "", show:false}) setData({...data, title: e.target.title.value, description: e.target.description.value}) } // setData(newData); } // console.log(data) const handleChange = (e) => { let primaryImage = e.target.files[0] console.log("PRIMARY IMG ", primaryImage, "nameOriginal", e.target.name) console.log(primaryImage) newData['primarImg'] = "" } const handleTag = (tag) => { setCurrentTag(tag) }; const handleCancel = () => { navigate("/dashboard"); }; return (

)}
); }; export default CreateProduct;
